dcterms:description: The SWIG-HOI dataset encompasses 400 human actions and 1000 object categories, with approximately 14,000 images and 5,500 interactions in the test set, including around 1,800 interactions not present in the training set.
dcterms:title: SWIG-HOI

dcterms:creator: Yu-Wei Chao
Yunfan Liu
Xieyang Liu
Huayi Zeng
Jia Deng
dcterms:description: The HICO-DET dataset provides 600 combinations involving 117 human actions and 80 objects, simulating a zero-shot detection setting by holding out 120 rare interactions from all 600 interactions.
dcterms:title: HICO-DET
